questions.questions: I would rather be a ghost drifting by your side as a condemned soul than enter heaven without you. Because of your love, I will never be a lonely spirit. (2000)
There are only four questions of value in life. What is sacred? Of what is the spirit made of? What is worth living for? What is worth dying for? The answer to each is the same. Only love. (1995)
answers: Ten Things I Hate About You

questions.questions: I have crossed oceans of time to find you. (1992)
I came here tonight because when you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible. (1989)
Love has given me wings so I must fly. (2001)
Love? Above all things I believe in love! Love is like oxygen! Love is a many splendored thing, love lifts us up where we belong, all you need is love!
It doesnt matter if the guy is perfect or the girl is perfect, as long as they are perfect for each other. (1997)
I am someone else when Im with you, someone more like myself. (2001)
answers: Sunrise: A Song of Two Humans

questions.questions: If he loved you with all the power of his soul for a whole lifetime, he couldnt love you as much as I do in a single day. (1992)
Take love, multiply it by infinity and take it to the depths of forever and you still have only a glimpse of how I feel for you. (1998)
